complianceRequirements.title: Maintain CRAR >= 9%
complianceRequirements.description: Maintain minimum Capital to Risk-weighted Assets Ratio of 9% at all times
complianceRequirements.notes: CRAR at 10.8% as of Dec 2025. Monitor capital adequacy.

complianceRequirements.title: Tier 1 Capital Minimum (6%)
complianceRequirements.description: Maintain minimum Tier 1 capital of 6% of risk-weighted assets
complianceRequirements.notes: Tier 1 capital at 7.2%. Within regulatory limits.

complianceRequirements.title: Capital Conservation Buffer (1.0% for Tier 2)
complianceRequirements.description: Build and maintain capital conservation buffer as per UCB tier

complianceRequirements.title: Risk Management Committee Constitution
complianceRequirements.description: Constitute Risk Management Committee with minimum 3 directors
complianceRequirements.notes: RMC constituted with 4 directors. Quarterly meetings held.

complianceRequirements.title: Risk Management Policy
complianceRequirements.description: Establish comprehensive risk management policy covering all risk types
complianceRequirements.notes: Policy approved by Board. Annual review pending.

complianceRequirements.title: Risk Appetite Framework
complianceRequirements.description: Document and implement risk appetite statement approved by Board
complianceRequirements.notes: Risk appetite statement drafted. Board approval pending.

complianceRequirements.title: Standardized Approach for Credit Risk
complianceRequirements.description: Calculate credit risk capital using standardized approach
complianceRequirements.notes: Credit RWA calculated monthly. Returns submitted on time.

complianceRequirements.title: NPA Classification and Reporting
complianceRequirements.description: Classify NPAs as per RBI norms and maintain adequate provisions

complianceRequirements.title: Large Exposure Monitoring
complianceRequirements.description: Monitor single and group borrower exposures within prescribed limits
complianceRequirements.notes: Two exposures接近 single borrower limit. Monitoring weekly.

complianceRequirements.title: Interest Rate Risk Management (ALM)
complianceRequirements.notes: ALM policy not approved. Gap analysis incomplete.

complianceRequirements.title: ALCO Constitution and Functioning
complianceRequirements.description: Constitute Asset Liability Committee with defined responsibilities

complianceRequirements.title: Board Composition and Fit & Proper
complianceRequirements.description: Ensure board composition complies with RBI norms and fit & proper criteria
complianceRequirements.notes: All directors meet fit & proper criteria. Annual verification complete.

complianceRequirements.title: Audit Committee Functioning
complianceRequirements.description: Constitute Audit Committee with majority independent directors
complianceRequirements.notes: Audit Committee meeting held quarterly. All findings reviewed.

complianceRequirements.title: Cyber Security Policy
complianceRequirements.description: Establish and implement comprehensive cyber security policy
complianceRequirements.notes: Policy exists but not Board approved. Annual review overdue.

complianceRequirements.title: Business Continuity Plan
complianceRequirements.description: Maintain tested Business Continuity Plan for critical operations
complianceRequirements.notes: BCP document exists. Annual DR testing not conducted in 2025.
